hypothesis_content.title: DeFi Altcoin Mean Reversion Post-Protocol Upgrade
hypothesis_content.statement: When a major DeFi altcoin (AVAX, SOL, CRV) experiences a price surge >15% in 3 days following a protocol upgrade announcement, it will mean revert -8% to -12% within the next 5 trading days as hype dissipates and profit-taking occurs.
hypothesis_content.rationale: DeFi protocol upgrades often create short-term hype cycles where price overshoots fundamental value. Retail FOMO drives initial surge, followed by institutional profit-taking. The 5-day window captures typical hype decay patterns.
entry_conditions: Protocol upgrade announcement confirmed via official channels
Volume spike >200% of 30-day average during surge

exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >60% of such events continue rallying beyond +5% from entry point within 5 days, hypothesis fails.
